headline: Itron Shares Jump 8% on Q4 Earnings Beat, Revenues Fall Y/Y
summary: ITRI tops Q4 2025 EPS estimates as margins jump and bookings hit $737M, while new Resiliency Solutions bets aim to lift growth despite 2026 EPS dilution.

headline: Why Ametek (AME) International Revenue Trends Deserve Your Attention
summary: Examine Ametek's (AME) international revenue patterns and their implications on Wall Street's forecasts and the prospective trajectory of the stock.

headline: Gabelli Hosts 36th Annual Pump, Valve, and Water Systems Symposium
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., Feb. 18, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Gabelli Funds, LLC, will host its 36th Annual Pump, Valve, & Water Systems Symposium at Convene 530 Fifth Avenue in New York, NY on Thursday, February 26th, 2026. The event will feature discussions with leading companies and organizations across the industrial landscape, with an emphasis on critical infrastructure, aerospace and defense, machine tools, and the oil and gas industry.
